meta.job_title: Platform Cloud and Data Infrastructure Architect (Principal Engineer)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and implement large-scale data platforms and infrastructure for the Cisco Security Cloud services.
Architect and maintain secure, highly resilient, and highly available cloud infrastructures to host Cisco Security products.
Develop and operate similar global scale infrastructures distributed across various cloud providers and Cisco private data centers/PoPs.
Provide expertise in modern cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, and GCP, as well as current cloud-based data platforms.
Solve cloud infrastructure challenges through innovative software engineering approaches and ensure secure-by-default infrastructure.
Collaborate with application development teams in designing cloud infrastructure and writing infrastructure-as-code.
Lead and encourage teams in a highly matrixed organization, prioritizing cross-team projects and raising the code quality of the team.
Drive the architecture of an extensive infrastructure as a senior architect, solving challenges in high-performant, cost-efficient, and secure cloud infrastructure.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science or related field
